articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: EU advances rules that wrestle control of user data away from Big Tech - The Verge
articles.description: The EU has reached an agreement on a Data Act to regulate how data can be used and transferred in the bloc, giving users more control over data generated by their devices.
articles.content:
EU advances rules that wrestle control of user data away from Big Tech
